definition: to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime

sentences.english: People with long commutes tend to die younger.
sentences.chinese: 那些通勤時間較長的人也傾向於“英年早逝”。

sentences.english: The resulting stress and poverty, says Song, led to Zhang's early death.
sentences.chinese: 因此導致的壓力和貧困導致了張的早逝。

sentences.english: The reason why he died young was his inattention to health.
sentences.chinese: 他英年早逝的原因是他不注意自己的健康。

sentences.english: Pity is Hou Yaowen died so young.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是侯耀文英年早逝。

sentences.english: It's about the untimely death of a poet.
sentences.chinese: 它講的是一個詩人的早逝。

sentences.english: The study of geosciences in NE Asia suffers heavy loss because of their death.
sentences.chinese: 他們的英年早逝，對東北亞地學研究是一個重大損失。

sentences.english: Nutrition-deficient adults earn less and are more likely to die early (see article).
sentences.chinese: 營養不良的成年人賺的錢較少並且更有可能早逝。

sentences.english: The middle-aged man had always bached it since his wife died at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 自妻子早逝以來，那個中年人一直過着獨身生活。

sentences.english: Drug and alcohol abuse contributed to Brian's early death.
sentences.chinese: 濫用毒品和酗葡萄酒致使了布萊恩的早逝。

sentences.english: These included unemployment and human misery, leading to early death.
sentences.chinese: 包括失業及精神痛苦，這些都導致了早逝。

sentences.english: We express our deep regret at untimely death of your husband.
sentences.chinese: 我們對你丈夫的早逝表示深切哀悼。

sentences.english: I have lived with the prospect of an early death for the last 49 years.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的49年裏，我隨時可能已經英年早逝。

sentences.english: High blood pressure associated with obesity can result in and early death.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖引起的高血壓可能導致中風和早逝。

sentences.english: The mysterious circumstances surrounding his early death at the age of 53 have 20)given rise to a great deal of speculation.
sentences.chinese: 而他在53歲時神祕的英年早逝更是引起了各種猜測。

sentences.english: Disease cut Smith off in the best part of life.
sentences.chinese: 病魔使風華正茂的史密斯英年早逝。

sentences.english: They worked until overtired, lived with few protections and died young.
sentences.chinese: 他們的工作，直到過度疲勞，生活在一些保護和早逝。

definition: to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
to be orphaned of one's father
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
to have lost both one's parents
to be orphaned of one's father
